content.confirm_content: Are you sure you want to enable authentication? If you forget or lose the password, the charger has to be reset to factory defaults. See manual for details.

content.debug_report_desc_muted: complete report of all status information of this charger except passwords

content.factory_reset_modal_text: A factory reset will reset all configuration to their default values. This action cannot be undone! The charger will re-open the WiFi access point with the default SSID and passphrase from the manual. Are you sure?
content.reboot_desc: Restarts the web interface. Charging will not be interrupted.

script.no_info_page: Firmware file corrupted or for WARP 1 (info page missing)
script.wrong_firmware_type: Firmware file does not match the type of this charger

content.enable_mqtt_desc: This allows controlling the charger over the configured MQTT broker. MQTT API documentation

content.enable_mdns_desc: Allows other devices in this network to find the charger.

content.ap_hide_ssid_desc_pre: The charger is reachable under the BSSID
